name: Nemorosum Bites
description: Nemorosum Bites is a stealth 2.5d tension game where you play as a rat who is trying to save his colony from being cooked by the repugnant chef, the colony is trapped in different spaces of the kitchen, in order to rescue everyone you will be challenged by a variety of puzzles that will delay the rescue, there are different ways of manipulating the environment to help you complete the puzzles, you will learn different mechanics of game as you progress throughout the map
